name: Hidden in Plain Sight: The Epstein Files

episodes.title: The truth behind Trump & Epstein's 'strange' relationship | Hidden in Plain Sight: The Epstein Files
episodes.description:
In this episode of Hidden in Plain Sight: The Epstein Files, Times Radio's Maddie Hale speaks to US experts to understand the truth behind Trump and Epstein's relationship.

Warning: This episodes contains distressing subjects and may be unsuitable for some viewers. 

Producers: 
Morgan Burdick
Anna Smith
Ana Truesdale

Video editor: 
Luke Shelley

episodes.title: Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor could face prison time over Epstein | Hidden in Plain Sight
episodes.description:
“If he is found guilty of various crimes, he should be charged and should be prosecuted. If necessary, he should go to prison.” 

Andrew Lownie says it is “quite likely” Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor would go to prison over Epstein-related offences. The former Duke of York has repeatedly denied any wrongdoing. 

Warning: This episode contains distressing subjects and may be unsuitable for some viewers. 

Producers: 
Morgan Burdick
Anna Smith
Ana Truesdale

Video editor:

episodes.title: Inside Ghislaine Maxwell's dark & twisted relationship with Jeffrey Epstein | Hidden in Plain Sight
episodes.description:
On today's episode of Hidden in Plain Sight, Maddie Hale speaks to Nigel Cawthorne, Kinsey Schofield and Mary Fitilchyan to uncover Ghislaine Maxwell's rise and fall: from socialite to convicted sex offender.

episodes.title: Inside Jeffrey Epstein's rise and fall | Hidden in Plain Sight: The Epstein Files
episodes.description:
How did Jeffrey Epstein go from a New York teacher to one of the most nefarious sex offenders in history? And how did he evade justice for so long? 

Times Radio's Maddie Hale is joined by veteran journalist Adam Boulton, The Times's chief US reporter Josie Ensor, journalist and author Nigel Cawthorne, - associate attorney at the Bloom Firm Mary Fitilchyan and journalist and author Will Sommer. 

Warning: This episodes contains distressing subjects and may be unsuitable for some viewers. 

Producers: 
Morgan Burdick
Anna Smith
Ana Truesdale

Video editor: 
Luke Shelley
